簛字的基本解释

簛
shāi
古同“筛”。

簛
sī
竹枝。
竹节。

簛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shāi］
［《集韻》霜宜切，平支，生。］
(1)同“篩”。
(2)见“簛簛”。

簛字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　簛； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页898第44
【集韻】山宜切，音凘。【類篇】竹器，可以去麤取細。同籭。　又【玉篇】所街切。又所饑切。義?同。　又【集韻】相支切，音斯。竹節也。

簛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
簛字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
簛
shāi
Gu Tong "sieve".
簛
sī
Bamboo branches.
Bamboo joints.
簛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shāi]
["Ji Yun" cream should be cut, flat branch, raw. ]
(1) Same as "sieve".
(2) See "簛簛".
簛
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　簛; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 898 44
【Jiyun】Mountain Yiqie, sound 凘. 【Classes】Bamboo ware, you can go to the rough and fine. Same as Yan.　[Jade articles] Cut the street again. Also hungry. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] Phase and Branch, Yinsi. Bamboo joints also.
